## Functions

### generateSignedDivisionCode() {#a045f5491e24124a1ee6f454e5119c38c}

<MemberDefinition
  prototype={<>static Value &#42; generateSignedDivisionCode (<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/value">Value</a> &#42; Dividend, <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/value">Value</a> &#42; Divisor, <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/irbuilder">IRBuilder</a>&lt;&gt; &amp; Builder)</>}
  labels = {["static"]}>
Generate code to divide two signed integers.

Returns the quotient, rounded towards 0. Builder&#39;s insert point should be pointing where the caller wants code generated, e.g. at the sdiv instruction. This will generate a udiv in the process, and Builder&#39;s insert point will be pointing at the udiv (if present, i.e. not folded), ready to be expanded if the user wishes.

Definition at line <a href="#l00099">99</a> of file <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/transforms/lib/transforms/utils/integerdivision-cpp">IntegerDivision.cpp</a>.
</MemberDefinition>

### generateSignedRemainderCode() {#ab15480fad5e956eadbf7c6fa518c642e}

<MemberDefinition
  prototype={<>static Value &#42; generateSignedRemainderCode (<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/value">Value</a> &#42; Dividend, <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/value">Value</a> &#42; Divisor, <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/irbuilder">IRBuilder</a>&lt;&gt; &amp; Builder)</>}
  labels = {["static"]}>
Generate code to compute the remainder of two signed integers.

Returns the remainder, which will have the sign of the dividend. Builder&#39;s insert point should be pointing where the caller wants code generated, e.g. at the srem instruction. This will generate a urem in the process, and Builder&#39;s insert point will be pointing at the uren (if present, i.e. not folded), ready to be expanded if the user wishes

Definition at line <a href="#l00032">32</a> of file <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/transforms/lib/transforms/utils/integerdivision-cpp">IntegerDivision.cpp</a>.
</MemberDefinition>

  labels = {["static"]}>
Generates code to divide two unsigned scalar 32-bit or 64-bit integers.

Returns the quotient, rounded towards 0. Builder&#39;s insert point should point where the caller wants code generated, e.g. at the udiv instruction.

Definition at line <a href="#l00141">141</a> of file <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/transforms/lib/transforms/utils/integerdivision-cpp">IntegerDivision.cpp</a>.

This will generate a udiv in the process, and Builder&#39;s insert point will be pointing at the udiv (if present, i.e. not folded), ready to be expanded if the user wishes

<Link id="l00093" /><CodeLine lineNumber="93"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="comment"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00094" /><CodeLine lineNumber="94"><Highlight kind="comment">/// Generate code to divide two signed integers. Returns the quotient, rounded</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00095" /><CodeLine lineNumber="95"><Highlight kind="comment">/// towards 0 Builder&#39;s insert point should be pointing where the caller wants</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00096" /><CodeLine lineNumber="96"><Highlight kind="comment">/// code generated, e.g. at the sdiv instruction. This will generate a udiv in</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00097" /><CodeLine lineNumber="97"><Highlight kind="comment">/// the process, and Builder&#39;s insert point will be pointing at the udiv (if</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00098" /><CodeLine lineNumber="98"><Highlight kind="comment">/// present, i.e. not folded), ready to be expanded if the user wishes.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00099" /><CodeLine lineNumber="99" lineLink="#a045f5491e24124a1ee6f454e5119c38c"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">static</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/value">Value</a> &#42;<a href="#a045f5491e24124a1ee6f454e5119c38c">generateSignedDivisionCode</a>(<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/value">Value</a> &#42;Dividend, <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/value">Value</a> &#42;Divisor,</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00100" /><CodeLine lineNumber="100"><Highlight kind="normal">                                         <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/irbuilder">IRBuilder&lt;&gt;</a> &amp;Builder) &#123;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00101" /><CodeLine lineNumber="101"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// Implementation taken from compiler-rt&#39;s &#95;&#95;divsi3 and &#95;&#95;divdi3</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00102" /><CodeLine lineNumber="102"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00103" /><CodeLine lineNumber="103"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordtype">unsigned</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#abee0df5f7f703bb4462aba260ba0a60f">BitWidth</a> = Dividend-&gt;<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/value/#a0344a49526443edf90cc0aef3abd3337">getType</a>()-&gt;<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/type/#a13e877ef779ba7a0688081079f4f9b03">getIntegerBitWidth</a>();</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00104" /><CodeLine lineNumber="104"><Highlight kind="normal">  <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/constantint">ConstantInt</a> &#42;Shift = Builder.<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/irbuilderbase/#a95df4f20c933779306b9a936b88b99a5">getIntN</a>(<a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#abee0df5f7f703bb4462aba260ba0a60f">BitWidth</a>, <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#abee0df5f7f703bb4462aba260ba0a60f">BitWidth</a> - 1);</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00105" /><CodeLine lineNumber="105"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00106" /><CodeLine lineNumber="106"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// Following instructions are generated for both i32 (shift 31) and</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00107" /><CodeLine lineNumber="107"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// i64 (shift 63).</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00108" /><CodeLine lineNumber="108"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00109" /><CodeLine lineNumber="109"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// ;   %tmp    = ashr i32 %dividend, 31</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00110" /><CodeLine lineNumber="110"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// ;   %tmp1   = ashr i32 %divisor, 31</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00111" /><CodeLine lineNumber="111"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// ;   %tmp2   = xor i32 %tmp, %dividend</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00112" /><CodeLine lineNumber="112"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// ;   %u&#95;dvnd = sub nsw i32 %tmp2, %tmp</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00113" /><CodeLine lineNumber="113"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// ;   %tmp3   = xor i32 %tmp1, %divisor</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00114" /><CodeLine lineNumber="114"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// ;   %u&#95;dvsr = sub nsw i32 %tmp3, %tmp1</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00115" /><CodeLine lineNumber="115"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// ;   %q&#95;sgn  = xor i32 %tmp1, %tmp</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00116" /><CodeLine lineNumber="116"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// ;   %q&#95;mag  = udiv i32 %u&#95;dvnd, %u&#95;dvsr</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00117" /><CodeLine lineNumber="117"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// ;   %tmp4   = xor i32 %q&#95;mag, %q&#95;sgn</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00118" /><CodeLine lineNumber="118"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// ;   %q      = sub i32 %tmp4, %q&#95;sgn</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00138" /><CodeLine lineNumber="138"><Highlight kind="comment">/// Generates code to divide two unsigned scalar 32-bit or 64-bit integers.</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00139" /><CodeLine lineNumber="139"><Highlight kind="comment">/// Returns the quotient, rounded towards 0 Builder&#39;s insert point should</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00140" /><CodeLine lineNumber="140"><Highlight kind="comment">/// point where the caller wants code generated, e.g. at the udiv instruction.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00141" /><CodeLine lineNumber="141" lineLink="#ae01a605dfa5a83e767612e4124bb6e57"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">static</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/value">Value</a> &#42;<a href="#ae01a605dfa5a83e767612e4124bb6e57">generateUnsignedDivisionCode</a>(<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/value">Value</a> &#42;Dividend, <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/value">Value</a> &#42;Divisor,</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00142" /><CodeLine lineNumber="142"><Highlight kind="normal">                                           <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/irbuilder">IRBuilder&lt;&gt;</a> &amp;Builder) &#123;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00143" /><CodeLine lineNumber="143"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// The basic algorithm can be found in the compiler-rt project&#39;s</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00144" /><CodeLine lineNumber="144"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// implementation of &#95;&#95;udivsi3.c. Here, we do a lower-level IR based approach</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00145" /><CodeLine lineNumber="145"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// that&#39;s been hand-tuned to lessen the amount of control flow involved.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00163" /><CodeLine lineNumber="163"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// Our CFG is going to look like:</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00211" /><CodeLine lineNumber="211"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// Same instructions are generated for both i32 (msb 31) and i64 (msb 63).</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00212" /><CodeLine lineNumber="212"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00213" /><CodeLine lineNumber="213"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// First off, check for special cases: dividend or divisor is zero, divisor</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00214" /><CodeLine lineNumber="214"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// is greater than dividend, and divisor is 1</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00215" /><CodeLine lineNumber="215"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// ; special-cases:</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00216" /><CodeLine lineNumber="216"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// ;   %ret0&#95;1      = icmp eq i32 %divisor, 0</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00217" /><CodeLine lineNumber="217"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// ;   %ret0&#95;2      = icmp eq i32 %dividend, 0</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00218" /><CodeLine lineNumber="218"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// ;   %ret0&#95;3      = or i1 %ret0&#95;1, %ret0&#95;2</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00219" /><CodeLine lineNumber="219"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// ;   %tmp0        = tail call i32 @llvm.ctlz.i32(i32 %divisor, i1 true)</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00220" /><CodeLine lineNumber="220"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// ;   %tmp1        = tail call i32 @llvm.ctlz.i32(i32 %dividend, i1 true)</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00221" /><CodeLine lineNumber="221"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// ;   %sr          = sub nsw i32 %tmp0, %tmp1</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00222" /><CodeLine lineNumber="222"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// ;   %ret0&#95;4      = icmp ugt i32 %sr, 31</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00223" /><CodeLine lineNumber="223"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// ;   %ret0        = select i1 %ret0&#95;3, i1 true, i1 %ret0&#95;4</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00224" /><CodeLine lineNumber="224"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// ;   %retDividend = icmp eq i32 %sr, 31</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00225" /><CodeLine lineNumber="225"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// ;   %retVal      = select i1 %ret0, i32 0, i32 %dividend</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00347" /><CodeLine lineNumber="347"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="comment"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00348" /><CodeLine lineNumber="348"><Highlight kind="comment">/// Generate code to calculate the remainder of two integers, replacing Rem with</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00349" /><CodeLine lineNumber="349"><Highlight kind="comment">/// the generated code. This currently generates code using the udiv expansion,</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00350" /><CodeLine lineNumber="350"><Highlight kind="comment">/// but future work includes generating more specialized code, e.g. when more</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00351" /><CodeLine lineNumber="351"><Highlight kind="comment">/// information about the operands are known.</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00352" /><CodeLine lineNumber="352"><Highlight kind="comment">///</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00353" /><CodeLine lineNumber="353"><Highlight kind="comment">/// Replace Rem with generated code.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00354" /><CodeLine lineNumber="354" lineLink="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#ad0154d60f04a5d8549b44635852557f0"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordtype">bool</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#ad0154d60f04a5d8549b44635852557f0">llvm::expandRemainder</a>(<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/binaryoperator">BinaryOperator</a> &#42;Rem) &#123;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00355" /><CodeLine lineNumber="355"><Highlight kind="normal">  <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/amdgpu/silowercontrolflow-cpp/#a4868c5d81c5ccc98c47aeab6244346a0">assert</a>((Rem-&gt;<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/binaryoperator/#a31bf07f3f61525486633bc1d0bbaf029">getOpcode</a>() == Instruction::SRem ||</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00356" /><CodeLine lineNumber="356"><Highlight kind="normal">          Rem-&gt;<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/binaryoperator/#a31bf07f3f61525486633bc1d0bbaf029">getOpcode</a>() == Instruction::URem) &amp;&amp;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00357" /><CodeLine lineNumber="357"><Highlight kind="normal">         </Highlight><Highlight kind="stringliteral">&quot;Trying to expand remainder from a non-remainder function&quot;</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal">);</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00358" /><CodeLine lineNumber="358"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00359" /><CodeLine lineNumber="359"><Highlight kind="normal">  <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/irbuilder">IRBuilder&lt;&gt;</a> Builder(Rem);</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00360" /><CodeLine lineNumber="360"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00361" /><CodeLine lineNumber="361"><Highlight kind="normal">  <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/amdgpu/silowercontrolflow-cpp/#a4868c5d81c5ccc98c47aeab6244346a0">assert</a>(!Rem-&gt;<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/value/#a0344a49526443edf90cc0aef3abd3337">getType</a>()-&gt;<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/type/#a1bc022868b23918efa44df511f4d5b61">isVectorTy</a>() &amp;&amp; </Highlight><Highlight kind="stringliteral">&quot;Div over vectors not supported&quot;</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal">);</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00362" /><CodeLine lineNumber="362"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00363" /><CodeLine lineNumber="363"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// First prepare the sign if it&#39;s a signed remainder</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00364" /><CodeLine lineNumber="364"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">if</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> (Rem-&gt;<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/binaryoperator/#a31bf07f3f61525486633bc1d0bbaf029">getOpcode</a>() == Instruction::SRem) &#123;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00365" /><CodeLine lineNumber="365"><Highlight kind="normal">    <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/value">Value</a> &#42;Remainder = <a href="#ab15480fad5e956eadbf7c6fa518c642e">generateSignedRemainderCode</a>(Rem-&gt;<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/user/#aa0a2cb1582d1cec317bd205085469ca1">getOperand</a>(0),</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00366" /><CodeLine lineNumber="366"><Highlight kind="normal">                                                   Rem-&gt;<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/user/#aa0a2cb1582d1cec317bd205085469ca1">getOperand</a>(1), Builder);</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00367" /><CodeLine lineNumber="367"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00368" /><CodeLine lineNumber="368"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// Check whether this is the insert point while Rem is still valid.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00369" /><CodeLine lineNumber="369"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordtype">bool</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> IsInsertPoint = Rem-&gt;<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/ilist-node-impl/#af719fc783be6589465137d997701a432">getIterator</a>() == Builder.<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/irbuilderbase/#a4e5c1b91bf5e2860398e3fa35c96b5af">GetInsertPoint</a>();</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00370" /><CodeLine lineNumber="370"><Highlight kind="normal">    Rem-&gt;<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/value/#a3ab5fc45117b450e8bb04e564cb6e5f2">replaceAllUsesWith</a>(Remainder);</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00371" /><CodeLine lineNumber="371"><Highlight kind="normal">    Rem-&gt;<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/user/#a48ec5fcee6d2c17c723e8e67f169f948">dropAllReferences</a>();</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00372" /><CodeLine lineNumber="372"><Highlight kind="normal">    Rem-&gt;<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/instruction/#a601ee49a4c4e0babf29bd1cf09036570">eraseFromParent</a>();</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00373" /><CodeLine lineNumber="373"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00374" /><CodeLine lineNumber="374"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// If we didn&#39;t actually generate an urem instruction, we&#39;re done</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00375" /><CodeLine lineNumber="375"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// This happens for example if the input were constant. In this case the</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00376" /><CodeLine lineNumber="376"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// Builder insertion point was unchanged</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00377" /><CodeLine lineNumber="377"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">if</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> (IsInsertPoint)</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00378" /><CodeLine lineNumber="378"><Highlight kind="normal">      </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">return</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> </Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">true</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal">;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00379" /><CodeLine lineNumber="379"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00380" /><CodeLine lineNumber="380"><Highlight kind="normal">    <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/binaryoperator">BinaryOperator</a> &#42;BO = <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a22eeee01734061ac1b31ccd994c49eef">dyn&#95;cast&lt;BinaryOperator&gt;</a>(Builder.<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/irbuilderbase/#a4e5c1b91bf5e2860398e3fa35c96b5af">GetInsertPoint</a>());</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00381" /><CodeLine lineNumber="381"><Highlight kind="normal">    Rem = BO;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00382" /><CodeLine lineNumber="382"><Highlight kind="normal">  &#125;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00383" /><CodeLine lineNumber="383"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00384" /><CodeLine lineNumber="384"><Highlight kind="normal">  <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/value">Value</a> &#42;Remainder = <a href="#a483fe5b7dbc3cdd8deb8f45c8d68ce85">generateUnsignedRemainderCode</a>(Rem-&gt;<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/user/#aa0a2cb1582d1cec317bd205085469ca1">getOperand</a>(0),</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00385" /><CodeLine lineNumber="385"><Highlight kind="normal">                                                   Rem-&gt;<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/user/#aa0a2cb1582d1cec317bd205085469ca1">getOperand</a>(1), Builder);</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00386" /><CodeLine lineNumber="386"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00387" /><CodeLine lineNumber="387"><Highlight kind="normal">  Rem-&gt;<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/value/#a3ab5fc45117b450e8bb04e564cb6e5f2">replaceAllUsesWith</a>(Remainder);</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00388" /><CodeLine lineNumber="388"><Highlight kind="normal">  Rem-&gt;<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/user/#a48ec5fcee6d2c17c723e8e67f169f948">dropAllReferences</a>();</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00389" /><CodeLine lineNumber="389"><Highlight kind="normal">  Rem-&gt;<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/instruction/#a601ee49a4c4e0babf29bd1cf09036570">eraseFromParent</a>();</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00390" /><CodeLine lineNumber="390"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00391" /><CodeLine lineNumber="391"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// Expand the udiv</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
